GSD.description:
ARM: mmp: Fix failure to remove sram device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit 734ff1117d5f7d7ca41bda5666366bb95fbc062b. For more details please see the references link.
